blademaster:DancersAmulet.NAME: Dancer's Amulet
blademaster:DancersAmulet.FLAVOR: A mildly special amulet, I suppose.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #bCombo and #bFury. Whenever you defeat an #rElite, choose to obtain one of 3 #gPerks.

blademaster:RandomBladePerk.NAME: Perk: Blades
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, channel #b1 random #yBlade.

blademaster:RandomDefensiveStancePerk.NAME: Perk: Defensive Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, switch your #yDefensive #yStance to a random #yStance.

blademaster:RandomStancePerk.NAME: Perk: Offensive Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, switch your #yOffensive #yStance to a random #yStance.

blademaster:FinisherDrawCardPerk.NAME: Perk: Finisher Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #rFinisher, draw 1 card.

blademaster:StanceHealPerk.NAME: Perk: Healthy Stances
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, heal #b4 HP per #yStance you're in.

blademaster:ComboEveryTurnPerk.NAME: Perk: Alacrity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #yCombo.

blademaster:FuryEveryTurnPerk.NAME: Perk: Endless Rage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b5 #yFury.
